code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TrainerBMIReports(_ref){let{auth}=_ref;const[logs,setLogs]=useState([]);const[clients,setClients]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{if(!(auth!==null&&auth!==void 0&&auth.id))return;axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/users?trainerId=".concat(auth.id)).then(res=>setClients(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error("Error fetching clients:",err));axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/bmi/trainer/".concat(auth.id)).then(res=>setLogs(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error("Error fetching BMI logs:",err));},[auth.id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Client BMI Reports"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",style:{marginTop:12},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list",children:[logs.map(l=>{const user=clients.find(c=>c.id===l.userId);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:(user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.name)||"Client"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["H ",l.height," cm \u2022 W ",l.weight," kg \u2022 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["BMI ",l.bmi]})]})]},l.id);}),!logs.length&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{padding:12},children:"No BMI logs for clients yet."})]})})]});}export default TrainerBMIReports;
